select c.cat_name as categoryname, sum(ot.dt_amount * ot.dt_price) as orderprice from product_tbl p, ordetail_tbl ot, ( select p.cat_name, c.cat_code from category_tbl c, category_tbl p where c.cat_prtcode = p.cat_code ) c
where p.pro_num = ot.pro_num and p.cat_code = c.cat_code group by c.cat_name order by c.cat_name
